constructor.details: Initializes the target Vaultis contract address, prize token, and other parameters.

params._prizeTokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token used as a prize.
params._riddleId: The ID of the riddle this contract will try to claim for.
params._vaultisAddress: The address of the Vaultis contract to attack.

startPayoutAttack(uint256,uint256).details: This function is intended to be called by the Vaultis owner.It attempts to recursively call `payout` within its `receive` function.

params._maxRecursions: The maximum number of recursive calls to attempt.
params._payoutAmount: The amount of prize to expect in each successful payout.

owner().notice: The owner of this ReentrancyAttackPayout contract.

prizeToken().notice: The ERC20 token used for prizes in Vaultis.

startPayoutAttack(uint256,uint256).notice: Initiates a controlled reentrancy attack on the Vaultis contract's `payout` function.

vaultis().notice: The instance of the Vaultis contract that this contract will attempt to attack.

withdrawEther().notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any ETH held by this contract.

withdrawTokens(address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw any ERC20 tokens held by this contract.
